sentences.en: A fall on the leaves didn't hurt a spry fellow like him.
sentences.cn: 摔倒在树叶上,伤不着象他这号利索的家伙.

sentences.en: A spry old gentleman answered, They send us on bus tours!
sentences.cn: 一位调皮的老绅士回答:“这不, 他们把我们这些老家伙送上了观光巴士! ”

sentences.en: He was a spry, suave, and very precise general.
sentences.cn: 他是一位生气勃勃, 温文尔雅, 一丝不苟的将军.

sentences.en: He was hollow - chested, squint - eyed, and rather shambling, but spry enough withal.
sentences.cn: 他胸膛低陷, 眼睛斜视, 步履蹒跚, 但又着实生气勃勃.

sentences.en: He was very spry and well - dressed.
sentences.cn: 他很活泼而且衣着讲究.

sentences.en: I advised Spry to mount a SATYR operation, and demonstrated the device to him.
sentences.cn: 我建议斯普赖安装“森林之神”装置, 并向他作了示范.

sentences.en: Look spry! The bus is coming!
Paul Sherman Yale was small, spry and upright.
sentences.cn: 保罗·谢尔曼·耶尔身材矮小, 动作敏捷,站得笔挺.

sentences.en: The game plan against the small - but - spry Warriors was simple, really.
sentences.cn: 虽然勇士的小个 阵容 战斗力很强,但我们还是赢得挺轻松的.

sentences.en: The old gentleman was as spry as ever.
When Teacher Ma was 70 years old, he was as spry as a kitten.
sentences.cn: 马老师七十岁的时候, 还轻快敏捷地像只小猫一般.

sentences.en: You don't get to be 92 and still spry by being stupid.
sentences.cn: 如果你慵懒就不能活到92并且仍然充满生气.

sentences.en: You're looking very spry this morning, what's cheered you up?
sentences.cn: 今天早上你兴高采烈, 什么事使你高兴了?

trans.tran_en: a spry old person has energy and is active
